title: Itazura Majoko no Daibouken
original_name: いたずらまじょ子の大冒険
sinopse: While cleaning her room, a young girl named Nana finds a mysterious diary. As soon as she opens it, out pops Majoko, a rambunctious wizard girl from the Land of Magic! Together, these two girls explore a fantastic world full of magic spells, wondrous creatures, and endless surprises. Every day is a big adventure when Majoko is around! (Source: Udon Entertainment)
